verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not, neither be thou \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*: \w take|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* with thee, and \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*: \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and his \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:

And thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* and her \w king|strong="H4428"\w* as thou \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* unto \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* and her \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: only the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* thereof, and the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* thereof, shall ye take for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* unto yourselves: \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* thee an \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* for the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* it.

¶ So \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, to go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* against \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*: and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* chose \w out|strong="H0977"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Behold|strong="H7200"\w*, ye shall lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* against the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add even\add* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w go|strong="H7368"\w* not \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w far|strong="H7368"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, but be ye all \w ready|strong="H3559"\w*:

And I, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add are\add* with me, will \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: and it shall come to pass, when they come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* us, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*, that we will \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them,

(For they will come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* us) till we have \w drawn|strong="H5423"\w* them from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*; for they will \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, They \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us, as at the \w first|strong="H7223"\w*: therefore we will \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them.\f + \fr 8.6 \ft drawn: Heb. pulled\f*

Then ye shall rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from the \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w*, and \w seize|strong="H3423"\w* upon the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* it into your \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

And it shall be, when ye have \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \add that\add* ye shall \w set|strong="H3341"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: according to the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall ye \w do|strong="H6213"\w*. \w See|strong="H7200"\w*, I have \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you.

¶ \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* therefore sent them \w forth|strong="H7971"\w*: and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to lie in \w ambush|strong="H3993"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* between \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* and \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, on the west \w side|strong="H3220"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*: but \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w lodged|strong="H3885"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, he and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even the people\add* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* that \add were\add* with him, went \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and drew \w nigh|strong="H5066"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* before the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*: now \add there was\add* a \w valley|strong="H1516"\w* between them and \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* about \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, and \w set|strong="H7760"\w* them to lie in \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* between \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* and \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, on the west \w side|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5857"\w*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft of…: or, of Ai\f*

And when they had \w set|strong="H7760"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* that \add was\add* on the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and their liers in \w wait|strong="H6119"\w* on the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* that \w night|strong="H3915"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft liers…: Heb. lying in wait\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add it\add*, that they \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w* and rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, he and all his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, at a time \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*; but he \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* not that \add there were\add* liers in \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* against him \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* made as if they were \w beaten|strong="H5060"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* were \w called|strong="H2199"\w* together to \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them: and they \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, and were drawn \w away|strong="H5423"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And there was not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* or \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, that went not \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and they \w left|strong="H5800"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* after \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, Stretch \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w spear|strong="H3591"\w* that \add is\add* in thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*; for I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it into thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w spear|strong="H3591"\w* that \add he had\add* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* toward the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And the \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4120"\w* out of their \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and they \w ran|strong="H7323"\w* as soon as he had stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3920"\w* it, and \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w* and \w set|strong="H3341"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* on \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And when the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* them, they \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* ascended \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and they had no \w power|strong="H3027"\w* to \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* this way or that \w way|strong="H2008"\w*: and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* turned \w back|strong="H2015"\w* upon the \w pursuers|strong="H7291"\w*.\f + \fr 8.20 \ft power: Heb. hand\f*

And when \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that the \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* had \w taken|strong="H3920"\w* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and that the \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w ascended|strong="H5927"\w*, then they turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

And the \w other|strong="H0428"\w* issued \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* them; so they were in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, some on this side, and some on that side: and they \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them, so \w that|strong="H5704"\w* they \w let|strong="H7604"\w* none of them \w remain|strong="H8300"\w* or \w escape|strong="H6412"\w*.
And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* they \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* him to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*.

And it came to pass, when \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had made an \w end|strong="H3615"\w* of \w slaying|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* wherein they \w chased|strong="H7291"\w* them, and when they were all \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* on the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, until they were \w consumed|strong="H8552"\w*, that all the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* it with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

And \add so\add* it was, \add that\add* all that \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, both of \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, \add were\add* \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \add even\add* all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

For \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w drew|strong="H7725"\w* not his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, wherewith he stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w spear|strong="H3591"\w*, until he had utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*.

Only the \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w* and the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of that \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* took for a \w prey|strong="H0962"\w* unto themselves, according unto the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*.

And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w*, and \w made|strong="H7760"\w* it an \w heap|strong="H8510"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \add even\add* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* he \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* on a \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* until \w eventide|strong="H6256"\w*: and as soon as the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* was \w down|strong="H0935"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* that they should \w take|strong="H3381"\w* his \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* it at the \w entering|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* thereon a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \add that remaineth\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

¶ Then \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*,

As \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as it is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w whole|strong="H8003"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, over which no man hath lift \w up|strong="H5130"\w* \add any\add* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*: and they \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* thereon burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

¶ And he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* there upon the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* a \w copy|strong="H4932"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, which he \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and their \w elders|strong="H2205"\w*, and \w officers|strong="H7860"\w*, and their \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* on this side the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* and on that side before the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, which \w bare|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, as well the \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w*, as he that was \w born|strong="H0249"\w* among them; \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them \w over|strong="H0413"\w* \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Gerizim|strong="H1630"\w*, and \w half|strong="H2677"\w* of them over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ebal|strong="H5858"\w*; as \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w before|strong="H7223"\w*, that they should \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* he \w read|strong="H7121"\w* all the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, the \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* and \w cursings|strong="H7045"\w*, according to all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*.

There was not a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of all that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, which \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* not before all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, with the \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and the little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* that were \w conversant|strong="H1980"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* them.\f + \fr 8.35 \ft were…: Heb. walked\f*
